title: Clash Royale
summary: Clash Royale is a real-time PvP card game where tower defense meets epic battles

reviews.text: I dont know how long support has been nothing but an automated bot with limited reply options, as I used it today for the first time in ages, but its absolutely horrible. There isnt a way to talk to a human to report problems and I cant stand it. Ive been playing this game on and off since it was released, ive stuck through a lot of bad direction choices gameplay-wise, but this is something I just cant abide by. I wont be playing this game again until you can talk to an actual human for support.
its raige bait but its still the best stratagy game here irl

title: Ingress Prime
summary: Install Ingress and transform your world. Our future is at stake. Choose a side.

reviews.text: Great game for getting out and exploring urban and rural areas & finding places and objects you didn't know were there. Ingress Prime offers a mixed bag with some great gameplay & UI improvements overshadowed by lacking features, bad UI decisions, hit or miss graphical design, and major communication and decision making inconsistencies by Niantic. I have enjoyed Ingress & my local team since 2013 but have been more disappointed than impressed with Niantic. Though they still are keeping the game.
A classic, the first and in many ways, best ARG. I like triangles!

The quality of build of this game is absolutely apalling. So many bugs and defects. Crashes regularly. Unstable client and server side. Laggy. Can't even hold a stable location, which is a ridiculous situation for a location-based game.
enjoyable excuse to go out for a walk
